methods.name: GetHandbreakInput
methods.comment: Returns true if we have pulled the handbreak of the vehicle

methods.name: UpdateSimulation
methods.comment: Overrided update simulation to trigger DSOL gearbox if necessary

methods.name: GenerateTireForces
methods.comment: Overridden so we can take advantage of camber

methods.name: SetupWheelMassProperties_AssumesLocked
methods.comment: Overridden so we can take advantage of camber

methods.name: GetLargestTireLoadValue
methods.comment: returns the current largest tire load of the vehicle

methods.name: GetLargestLateralSlip
methods.comment: returns the current largest lat slip of the vehicle

methods.name: GetLargestLongitudinalSlip
methods.comment: returns the current largest long slip of the vehicle

properties.name: mUseDSOLGearbox
properties.comment: Use Jace's super awesome custom gearbox or not

properties.name: mDSOLMaxSlopeAngleLimit
properties.comment: Max slope Angle Limit (in degrees) in order to use all of SlopeShiftRatio

properties.name: mSlopeShiftRatio
properties.comment: Amount of ADDITIONAL required gear ratio in order to shift up or down, given a slope. The result is that on steep slopes, the vehicle will shift up at a higher ratio and shift down at a higher ratio.

properties.name: mDSOLDynGearboxData
properties.comment: Gearbox data that is tracked during simulation

properties.name: mPhysxUserData
properties.comment: Array of PhysX User defineable data that are passed to the shader

properties.name: mPhysxWheelUserData
properties.comment: Array of PhysXWheel User defineable data that are passed to the shader
